data.message: Bokeh/texture realism gap: My layered radial gradients read as "clean math" not "photographed lens blur." Fix requires: (1) film grain/noise overlay at 3-6% opacity, (2) larger ghost blobs with barely-visible edges and uneven falloff, (3) asymmetric hotspots - not centered. This is what separates "nice vector poster" from "premium printed campaign."
